title: Damage
data:
'''Damage''' is something that causes injury or loss. In ''Crawl'', this usually refers to something's [[HP]].

*See [[Damage types]] for the various elemental flavors of damage.
*See [[Weapon damage]] for damage formulas (of weapons & unarmed)
**See [[Unarmed Combat]] for details on the titular subject.

[[Category:Game mechanics]]

{{disambig}}
